name: Meltdown: The Complete Guide to Reactor Maintenance.
name_original: Meltdown: The Complete Guide to Reactor Maintenance.
description:
Premise

You're a fresh reactor tech straight out of the academy, and you've been assigned to work on the new Zeta-1 reactor. While not trained in the Zeta-1 specifically, you have the trusty technical manual "Meltdown: The Complete Guide to Reactor Maintenance." The title is hopefully ironic. Ready or not you're going to have to br prepared for anything as trouble is brewing, and things might not stay stable for too much longer.

GLORY TO THE EMPIRE.

Gameplay

point and click, M key to mute the music. Escape to quit.

NOTE - You only have to protect the center, damage to other areas won't go against you.

Technical

I've added two "Assets" files, "release" and "updated". "release" is the assets folder which was posted on the deadline, "updated" includes various fixes I've made since. I've included both for transparency. If you just want to remix or poke at the game, "Assets - updated" is all you should care about.


Gameplay Demo
